name: SpaceJam
description:
SpaceJam is a rhythm mining game to show the process of mining, refining, stripping, and shipping the ore mined from asteroids. Points are based on the current market price of platinum class metals.

#IndieGalactic #SpaceJam

Alexander Friant - Audio Master, Programmer, Particle Master

Tyler Quillen - Programmer

Zack Henderson - Programmer

Brian Chan - Programmer, Animator, Art

Yasiman Ahsani - Art God
